ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and are forgetful of their salat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But who are oblivious of their moral duties,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but are heedless in their Prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who become confused during their prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who are neglectful of their prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who with their Salah are Sahun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who are unmindful of their prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and are heedless of their prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who are heedless of their prayer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but whose hearts are not in their prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As are of their prayer careless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but are heedless of their prayers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who are neglectful of their prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who delay their Salat (prayer) from their stated fixed times,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who are heedless of their prayers (delaying them from their prescribed times),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who are heedless of their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [107:5] those who are heedless of their prayers, neglectful, delaying them from their appointed times,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained who they are by saying: (Who are heedless of their prayer) who are distracted from their prayers and fail to perform them;
